description: Technical meets casual in these comfortable and versatile trousers. The G-1000 Eco Stretch fabric moves with you on bike rides to work or on after-office hikes with friends. Three zippered pockets take care of small items and the waist has elastic in the back for a perfect fit. A great, durable choice for everyday outdoor life and the simple, clean design means they will blend in on urban missions too.
name: Fjallraven Vardag Trousers, Long - Mens
